resources.string: Show the touchscreen controller on start
All files access permission is required

This game uses resources (such as levels, episodes, graphics, music, sounds, configs, etc.) that was placed by user on the local storage directly. This allows users to modify and extend the content for their own purposes like that was done at the desktop version of this game. Unfortunately, Android 11+ doesn\'t gives the way to grant an individual permission for the specific directory instead of a single file. To run this game you should grand the access to all files to the game because of explained reason.

Whoops, the game can\'t start because the game resources directory is not selected. This game requires you to manually download and unpack the archive with game assets, and then select the directory that contains them. If you downloaded and unpacked them already, please select the directory that contains the game assets. Do you want to select the assets directory for now?
